author: Jayme Schuler
title: 27 Facts About Indian Ocean Tsunami
text: The Indian Ocean tsunami of 2004 remains one of the most devastating natural disasters in recent history. Triggered by a massive undersea earthquake off the coast of Sumatra, this catastrophic event claimed over 230,000 lives across 14 countries. But what exactly caused such widespread destruction? The earthquake, measuring a staggering 9.1 on the Richter scale, unleashed powerful waves that traveled at speeds up to 500 miles per hour. These waves, known as tsunamis , can cause immense damage when they hit coastal areas. Understanding the impact and aftermath of this disaster is crucial for preparedness and resilience in the face of future tsunamis. Let's dive into 27 compelling facts about the Indian Ocean tsunami that highlight its scale, impact, and the lessons learned.

author: KHOU
title: Central Texas RV resort manager helps save more than 20 lives when devastating floodwaters took over - NewsBreak
text:
Center Point
Central Texas RV resort manager helps save more than 20 lives when devastating floodwaters took over
49 minutes ago
CENTER POINT, Texas — The camp manager of an RV resort in Center Point, Texas, said he’s grateful to be alive after catastrophic flooding swept through the resort over the Fourth of July holiday. While his home was washed away, his quick actions helped save more than 20 lives.

author: Christine Thropp
title: V2X Secures Army Bridge Contract for Continued National Training Center Support; Ken Shreves Quoted
text: [V2X](https://executivegov.com/?s=v2x) was awarded a bridge contract with the U.S. Army to continue supporting training operations at the [National Training Center](https://www.prnewswire.com/news-releases/v2x-to-continue-legacy-of-excellence-in-delivering-training-solutions-to-the-us-army-at-the-national-training-center-302136646.html) for one more year, building on its five-year work under the NTC Services Contract. The company said Monday it provides the Ft. Irwin, California-based center with advisory services, technical expertise and system operators in support of its trainings. Under the bridge contract, V2X will perform audio-visual operations, leadership advisory services, Blue Force Tracker system management, secure LAN operations and analytical system operations, among other services. “We are proud to be a trusted partner in delivering mission-critical support to the brigade combat teams cycling through the National Training Center,” said [Ken Shreves](https://gov2x.com/team/kenneth-w-shreves/), senior vice president of global mission solutions and chief service delivery and growth officer at V2X. “With our proven track record of providing high-consequence training support to the U.S. Army, V2X is uniquely positioned to prepare soldiers for global missions.” [Aileen Amirault](https://www.linkedin.com/in/aileen-amirault-65133544/), vice president and general manager of V2X Global Training Solutions, shared that the company has been supporting Army training centers for almost three decades. “Our commitment extends globally, as evidenced by our work at the Joint Multinational Readiness Center in Germany, and our delivery of training support, maintenance and range operations services to U.S. Army Central Command in Kuwait,” she added.

organizations.name: v2x secures army bridge contract for continued national training center support

title: Medical Answering Service AI Paves the Path for Enhanced Healthcare Sector | dailytimesleader.com | Serving West Point & Clay County Since 1867
text:
Amidst the ongoing digital revolution and the escalating prevalence of online presence, there is a notable surge in the demand for medical answering services. This surge has opened up new prospects for call service providers. However, the market is now saturated with subpar solutions, prompting healthcare professionals to seek a dependable medical practice answering service.
Since its establishment in 1991, Medical Answering Services AI has been a trailblazer in the industry, consistently adapting to the evolving needs of healthcare practices. With over three decades of experience, it proudly introduces an innovative approach to medical call management designed to streamline operations, enhance patient care, and elevate communication standards within the healthcare sector. This groundbreaking service will reshape how healthcare providers engage with their patients, blending extensive experience with cutting-edge technology for a more efficient and promising future. In our recent discussion with the team, we will delve into their recent successes and explore valuable lessons that other companies can extract from their journey.
Establishing Confidence: 14-Day Trial Period
Understanding the critical importance of trust in healthcare services, the company emphasizes its commitment to excellence through a complimentary 14-day trial period. This trial serves as a concrete expression of the company's dedication to transparency and quality, providing medical practitioners with a firsthand experience of the positive impact of its services on their daily operations. The company aims to build trust with potential clients by offering this opportunity, showcasing efficacy and reliability.
Established Reputation Since 1991
With a rich history dating back to 1991, the company has become a trusted nationwide medical practice answering service. Over the years, it has continuously adjusted to the evolving needs of the healthcare industry, positioning itself as a reliable and forward-thinking service provider. By staying abreast of industry developments, the company endeavors to provide its clients with top-notch service, nurturing lasting relationships founded on trust, reliability, and a shared dedication to advancing patient care.
Emphasizing Clarity through Affordable Solutions
A fundamental aspect of their mission is prioritizing transparency and accessibility in healthcare solutions. This commitment is demonstrated through their cost-effective offering – a medical answering service available at a flat monthly rate of only $69. This budget-friendly solution enables healthcare practitioners of all sizes to provide uninterrupted patient care without burdening their finances. The steadfast commitment to transparency ensures clients receive a valuable service without hidden costs or unexpected financial surprises.
Dependable Support Around the Clock
Recognizing the constant demands of the healthcare sector, the company functions as a 24/7 medical call center. This persistent service structure empowers them to address patient inquiries, manage appointment scheduling, and respond to emergency calls at any hour. This unwavering dedication to around-the-clock availability guarantees that your patients receive timely care, significantly enhancing healthcare delivery's efficiency and reliability.
Assisting a Wide Spectrum of Healthcare Fields
Acknowledging the multifaceted nature of healthcare, the company tailors its services to address the distinctive requirements of individual healthcare facilities. This customized approach guarantees a smooth and continuous patient experience for diverse healthcare professionals, from hospitals and pediatricians to OBGYNs, dentists, mental health practitioners, hospices, and specialists. By accommodating the unique needs of each sector, the company enhances the overall effectiveness and efficiency of healthcare delivery.
Providing Precision through Accurate Call Routing
Efficient triaging of incoming calls is important in healthcare operations. The system adeptly differentiates between urgent and non-urgent calls, prioritizing immediate attention for critical issues and appropriately handling non-emergent matters. This precise call routing minimizes unnecessary disruptions for medical staff, streamlining communication and enhancing the overall effectiveness of healthcare services.
Ensuring Patient Privacy through a HIPAA-Compliant Strategy
Medical Answering Service AI safeguards patient privacy and upholds data security. The company takes pride in providing a reliable medical practice answering service that adheres to HIPAA compliance, underscoring its dedication to this responsibility. This compliance guarantees the utmost security standards in handling sensitive patient information, creating an atmosphere of trust and confidence. Selecting the appropriate medical answering service is vital to ensure the seamless functioning of your medical practice.
"The medical answering service we provide is 100% HIPAA compliant and completely secure. Our secure messaging service lets you and your patients rest easy, knowing that patient information remains safe. Ensuring all your systems and staff communication procedures are HIPAA compliant is key."
